org.jamesframework.core.search.neigh.subset

Class SingleSwapNeighbourhood

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamesframework.core.search.neigh.subset.SingleSwapNeighbourhood
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Neighbourhood<SubsetSolution>

    public class SingleSwapNeighbourhood
extends Object
implements Neighbourhood<SubsetSolution>
    A subset neighbourhood that generates swap moves only (see SwapMove). When applying moves generated by this neighbourhood to a given subset solution, the set of selected IDs will always remain of the same size. Therefore, this neighbourhood is only suited for fixed size subset selection problems.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

      Constructors

      SingleSwapNeighbourhood()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Move<SubsetSolution>> getAllMoves(SubsetSolution solution)
      Generates a set of all possible swap moves that transform the given subset solution by removing a single ID from the current selection and replacing it with a new ID which is currently not selected.
      Move<SubsetSolution> getRandomMove(SubsetSolution solution)
      Generates a random swap move for the given subset solution that removes a single ID from the set of currently selected IDs, and replaces it with a random ID taken from the set of currently unselected IDs.

      • SingleSwapNeighbourhood

        public SingleSwapNeighbourhood()

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomMove

        public Move<SubsetSolution> getRandomMove(SubsetSolution solution)
        Generates a random swap move for the given subset solution that removes a single ID from the set of currently selected IDs, and replaces it with a random ID taken from the set of currently unselected IDs. In case when all or no IDs are currently selected, null is returned, as then it is not possible to perform a swap because either the set of unselected or selected IDs, respectively, is empty.
        Specified by:
        getRandomMove in interface Neighbourhood<SubsetSolution>
        Parameters:
        solution - solution for which a random swap move is generated
        Returns:
        random swap move, null if no or all IDs are currently selected

      • getAllMoves

        public Set<Move<SubsetSolution>> getAllMoves(SubsetSolution solution)
        Generates a set of all possible swap moves that transform the given subset solution by removing a single ID from the current selection and replacing it with a new ID which is currently not selected. May return an empty list if no swap moves can be applied, i.e. if currently all or no IDs are selected.
        Specified by:
        getAllMoves in interface Neighbourhood<SubsetSolution>
        Parameters:
        solution - solution for which all possible swap moves are generated
        Returns:
        set of all swap moves, may be empty
